reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on identifying unique, specific features mentioned in the tags, especially for rooms that had multiple candidates (Living Room, Bedrooms, Bathrooms, Kitchen). For the two living room descriptions (Desc_1, Desc_2) and the two master bedroom descriptions (Desc_5, Desc_6), which shared the same physical space across two images, the assignment was based on which image best highlighted the differentiating tags. For instance, Desc_2's focus on '玄關明確' (clear entrance) and '空間開闊' (spacious) was best represented by the wider view in Image_1. Desc_3 was uniquely identified by the '衣櫃到頂' (floor-to-ceiling wardrobe) which is bright pink in Image_3. Desc_7 and Desc_8 were separated by the presence of a '木質天花' (wood ceiling) in Image_7 and '馬賽克磁磚' (mosaic tiles) in Image_8. All 12 descriptions were successfully mapped 1:1 to the 12 provided images.

matching_result_list.evidence: Living room view emphasizing the sofa, AC, and ample storage ('收納充足', '已裝冷氣', '家具配置佳').
